Tags.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

valueType.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: AWS::RoboMaker::Fleet resource creates an AWS RoboMaker fleet. Fleets contain robots and can receive deployments.

attributes.description: AWS::RoboMaker::Fleet resource creates an AWS RoboMaker fleet. Fleets contain robots and can receive deployments.
